documentation.text: @notice event firing for withrawal and deposits

@notice deposit function, adds amount to user balance
 @param amount to deposit

@notice withdraw function, substract amount from user balance and send the amount 
 @param amount to withdraw
@notice withdraw all function, send remaining balance back to user
@notice event firing for withrawal and deposits

@notice deposit function, adds amount to user balance
 @param amount to deposit

@notice withdraw function, substract amount from user balance and send the amount 
 @param amount to withdraw
@notice withdraw all function, send remaining balance back to user

PlayerDeposit(address,uint256).notice: event firing for withrawal and deposits

deposit(uint256).notice: deposit function, adds amount to user balance

withdraw(uint256).notice: withdraw function, substract amount from user balance and send the amount

withdrawAll().notice: withdraw all function, send remaining balance back to user
